title: Email sync engine (History API, polling, webhook)
description: Build the sync engine that processes Gmail history events, syncs new messages, and handles both webhook-triggered and polling-based sync per spec 04-email-processing-pipeline.md.

title: Draft generation & rework loop
description: Implement AI draft generation for needs_response emails, context gathering from prior correspondence, and the rework loop (user feedback via ✂️ marker, up to 3 iterations) per specs 04 and 06.

title: LLM gateway abstraction
description: Build the model-agnostic LLM gateway that supports any OpenAI-compatible API. Separate configs for fast/cheap (classification) and high-quality (drafting) models per spec 01-system-overview.md.

title: Bootstrap Rails project (scaffold, DB setup, CLAUDE.md, linting, CI)

title: Background jobs framework (classify, draft, sync, cleanup)
description: Set up ActiveJob with Sidekiq backend. Implement all background jobs: SyncJob, ClassifyJob, DraftJob, CleanupJob, SentDetectionJob per spec 06-background-jobs.md.

title: Google OAuth & Gmail API integration
description: Implement Google OAuth2 flow, token storage/refresh, and Gmail API client wrapper per spec 05-google-integration.md. Includes Pub/Sub webhook endpoint for push notifications.
close_reason: OAuth controller, Gmail client/draft_builder/message_parser services committed

title: Data model: migrations, models, validations, associations
description: Create all database migrations and ActiveRecord models per spec 02-data-model.md. Includes User, GmailAccount, Email, Thread, Label, Draft, ClassificationResult, AgentExecution, ContactStyle, and all associations/validations/invariants.
close_reason: Data model complete: migrations, models, validations, associations for all entities

title: Agent framework (config-driven routing, tool registry, agent loop)
description: Build the agent framework: config-driven router that directs emails to agent processing, tool registry, multi-turn LLM agent loop per spec 07-agent-framework.md.

title: Email classification pipeline (rules + LLM)
description: Implement the two-tier classification system: deterministic rules engine followed by LLM-based classification. Includes label application per spec 04-email-processing-pipeline.md.

title: Auth, admin dashboard & configuration
description: Implement authentication, admin dashboard for monitoring/debugging, and system configuration per spec 08-auth-admin-configuration.md.

title: API endpoints (webhooks, admin, health)
description: Implement all API endpoints per spec 03-api-contracts.md: Gmail webhook receiver, admin dashboard endpoints, health check.
